name: Super Giant Robot Cat Assembly!
description:
A great war is coming, and you've been tasked to create an army, a GIANT ROBOT CAT ARMY YEAH! But they're very expensive so try not to break them.

Made for Dogpit Jam 2018. All the buttons you need to know are the arrow keys and the enter button to start and restart the game. There is also neat beat heavy metal music and super cool robot sounds which might sound a bit loud so you might want to lower your volume a couple of notches ~

(Sometimes the music and sounds would sound out of sync, but after a first run or a refresh it should be fine)

Music by the rad Augustus
